ValidationRule.description: This validation rule checks for the rating value range if it is from 1 to 5
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR ( Cleanliness_And_Hygiene__c > 5, Cleanliness_And_Hygiene__c < 1, Food_Quality__c > 5, Food_Quality__c < 1, Hospitality__c > 5, Hospitality__c < 1, Value_For_Money__c > 5, Value_For_Money__c < 1)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill all the ratings value in the range of 1 to 5
